content: conocimientos básicos de crochet y comprensión de instrucciones técnicas *** *** este artículo es un archivo de descarga digital un tutorial con las instrucciones detalladas para crear el producto físico *** *********************************************************** **eng** **what s this project about ** the pixel vest is a garment built from a central granny square with added rounds on the sides to shape the armholes and neckline it s simple to construct and you can make it in wool acrylic merino alpaca or any other warm fiber for colder weather or choose cotton bamboo or linen for a lighter summer version more like a crochet top the instructions are written for size s/m but you ll find guidance to make it larger or smaller depending on how many rounds you add to the central granny try different color combos play with textures or even change the length just add as many rounds as you like **what s included in this pattern ** this pattern comes in a downloadable pdf with 14 pages including step-by-step photos diagrams written instructions and a link to a video tutorial where i teach you how to crochet the 1x1 ribbing stitch used for the vest edges **what materials do i need ** 1- worsted weight yarn 10 wpi the amount will depend on your chosen size and color combo for reference the sample vest uses 150 grams 300 meters of beige yarn 45 grams 90 meters of turquoise yarn 45 grams 90 meters of fuchsia yarn 2- 6 5 mm crochet hook or the size needed to meet the gauge 3- yarn needle 4- scissors 5- measuring tape 6- optional stitch markers **what s the gauge for this project ** worked in double_crochet using worsted weight yarn and a 6 5 mm crochet hook 10 stitches and 6 row = 10 x 10 cm square **what sizes does this project include ** this design is written for size s/m but it s very easy to adjust to other sizes **what should you know before starting ** basic crochet skills are required magic_ring chain stitches slip_stitch double_crochet front post and back post double_crochet you ll find a video tutorial for these in the pdf *** to make this design it s important that you know how to read crochet charts/diagrams and how to work in the round for the central granny *** _____________ if you have any questions about the pattern or the information provided feel free to reach out to me at hellosoyolivia@gmail com i ll be happy to help *** this pattern requires basic crochet knowledge and the ability to follow technical instructions *** *** this is a digital download it s a tutorial with detailed instructions to create the physical product ***
